        {
            "Role": "Standby",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"

        "postgres-6fego161"
    ]

Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: InitDBInstances

{
    "AdminPassword": "testuser%40123",
    "Charset": "UTF8",
    "AdminName": "testuser",
    "DBInstanceIdSet": [
        "postgres-lnp6j617",
        "postgres-6fego161"
    ]
}

ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.document: This example shows you how to modify the backup download restrictions.
ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.input: POST / HTTP/1.1Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.comContent-Type: application/jsonX-TC-Action: ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction<common request parameters>{    "RestrictionType": "CUSTOMIZE",    "VpcRestrictionEffect": "ALLOW",    "VpcIdSet": [        "vpc-15ld6dhr"    ],    "IpRestrictionEffect": "",    "IpSet": []}
ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.title: Modifying the backup download restrictions

ModifyBackupPlan.document: This example shows you how to modify the backup plan of the instance "postgres-xxxxxxxx". According to the new backup plan, the instance will be backed up during 01:00:00–02:00:00 AM and the backup files will be retained for 7 days.
ModifyBackupPlan.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBackupPlan
<Common request parameters>

{
    "BackupPeriod": [
        "tuesday",
        "monday"
    ],
    "BaseBackupRetentionPeriod": "7",
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-xxxxxxxx",
    "MinBackupStartTime": "01:00:00",
    "MaxBackupStartTime": "02:00:00"
}
ModifyBackupPlan.title: Modifying the backup plan of an instance

ModifyBaseBackupExpireTime.document: This example shows you how to modify the expiration time to "2023-02-18 23:59:59" for the data backup set "88d3a71e-b822-5728-9d41-d8cfc0d0556e" under the instance "postgres-9n26zs6n".
ModifyBaseBackupExpireTime.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBaseBackupExpireTime
<Common request parameters>

{
    "BaseBackupId": "88d3a71e-b822-5728-9d41-d8cfc0d0556e",
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-9n26zs6n",
    "NewExpireTime": "2023-02-18 23:59:59"
}
ModifyBaseBackupExpireTime.title: Modifying the Expiration Time of Data Backup

ModifyDBInstanceChargeType.document: This example shows you how to modify the billing mode to monthly subscription for the instance `postgres-apzvwncr`.
ModifyDBInstanceChargeType.input: POST / HTTP/1.1Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.comContent-Type: application/jsonX-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceChargeType<common request parameters>{    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-apzvwncr",    "InstanceChargeType": "PREPAID",    "AutoRenewFlag": 0,    "AutoVoucher": 0,    "Period": 1}
ModifyDBInstanceChargeType.title: Modifying the billing mode for the instance `postgres-apzvwncr`

ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.document: This example shows you how to modify the node deployment of instance "postgres-abcd1234" so that both primary and standby nodes reside in Guangzhou Zone 3.
ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.title: Changing instance deployment mode to single-AZ deployment

ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.document: This example shows you how to modify the node deployment of instance "postgres-abcd1234" so that the primary node resides in Guangzhou Zone 1 and the standby node in Guangzhou Zone 2.
ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.title: Changing instance deployment mode to multi-AZ deployment

ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.document: This example shows you how to set the primary-standby replication mode to be async and the maximum delay for switch.
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-32d4mmv9",
    "SyncMode": "Async",
    "MaxStandbyLatency": 10737418240,
    "MaxStandbyLag": 10
}
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.title: Modifying the replication mode to be async

ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.document: This example shows you how to set the primary-standby replication mode to be semi-sync (downgradable to async) and the maximum delay for switch.
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-32d4mmv9",
    "SyncMode": "Semi-sync",
    "MaxStandbyLatency": 10737418240,
    "MaxStandbyLag": 10,
    "MaxSyncStandbyLatency": 1073741824,
    "MaxSyncStandbyLag": 5
}
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.title: Modifying the replication mode to be semi-sync (downgradable to async)

ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.document: This example shows you how to set the primary-standby replication mode to be semi-sync (non-downgradable to async) and the maximum delay for switch.
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-32d4mmv9",
    "SyncMode": "Semi-sync",
    "MaxStandbyLatency": 10737418240,
    "MaxStandbyLag": 10
}
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.title: u200cModifying the replication mode to be semi-sync (non-downgradable to async)

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This example shows you how to modify the configuration of instance postgres-6bwgamo3 to 1 CPU core, 2GB memory, and 200GB storage.
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Storage": 200,
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-6bwgamo3",
    "Cpu": 1,
    "Memory": 2
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: Modifying Instance Configurations

Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com

}

RestoreDBInstanceObjects.document: This example shows you how to specify a recovery time on the original instance to restore certain database-related objects. For example, on the postgres-abcd1234 instance, restore the test database at the recovery point of 2024-03-25 01:27:35.
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RestoreDBInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-abcd1234",
    "RestoreTargetTime": "2024-03-25 01:27:35",
    "RestoreObjects": [
        "test"
    ]
}
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.title: Specifying Recovery Time and Recovering Database Objects

RestoreDBInstanceObjects.document: This example shows you how to select a backup set on the original instance to restore certain database-related objects. For example, on the postgres-abcd1234 instance, use the backup set 28aa61ac-1b1f-566a-bedb-6e918024be02 to restore the test database.
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RestoreDBInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-abcd1234",
    "BackupSetId": "28aa61ac-1b1f-566a-bedb-6e918024be02",
    "RestoreObjects": [
        "test"
    ]
}
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.title: Selecting a Backup Set and Recovering Database Objects

    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-6bwgamo3",
    "Memory": "2"
}
UpgradeDBInstance.title: Upgrading an instance

UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.document: u200cu200cThis example shows you how to upgrade the kernel version of an instance.
UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "pgro-g7w4itfg",
    "TargetDBKernelVersion": "v12.7_r1.5",
    "DryRun": "true"
}
UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.title: Upgrading the version

UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.document: The current major version number of the instance is 10. If you need to use features related to PostgreSQL 15, you can upgrade the kernel version of the instance from 10 to 15 through the major version upgrade feature, and perform the upgrade within a specified time window.
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-qwe12k98",
    "TargetDBKernelVersion": "v15.1_r1.6",
    "UpgradeCheck": false,
    "BackupBeforeUpgrade": true,
    "StatisticsRefreshOption": 0,
    "ExtensionUpgradeOption": 0,
    "UpgradeTimeOption": 1,
    "UpgradeTimeBegin": "01:00:00",
    "UpgradeTimeEnd": "02:00:00"
}
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.title: Upgrading the Kernel Major Version of an Instance
